text: (Ggwe Nabbi Muhammad) gamba nti abange mmwe abaaweebwa ekitabo mujje twegatte ku kigambo ekigatta wakati waffe nammwe, nakyo kwekuba nga tetusinza okugyako Katonda, era tuleme ku mugattako kintu kyonna, era tube nga tetufuula abamu muffe ebyokusinza netuleka Katonda. Ekyo bwebakivaako, mmwe mubagambe nti (mmwe) mujulire nti mazima ffe tuli basiramu tukkiririza mu bwomu bwa Katonda
